content:
Here are the planned tickets for the meeting. In person reconciliation requesters have been notified. If they are unable to make it, they will be pulled from the agenda (I will note on this thread when a response is received). We may not get to tickets towards the bottom of the agenda.
This meeting is to come to consensus within the Da Vinci community before presenting and voting on by the sponsoring WG, Pharmacy.

FHIR-35196 - Issue with Presenting Drug Alternatives description (in-person)
FHIR-35197 - Add Indication-Based Formulary Design (in-person)
FHIR-35198 - Add Drug Covered Under Different Benefit (in-person)
FHIR-35365 - FormularyItem extensions need descriptive descsriptions
FHIR-35366 - Simplify FormularyItem by inlining drug codes

Begin discussion on Must Support Tickets:
FHIR-34526 - IG needs a definition of "must-support"
FHIR-34527 - Remove most must-support flags on profiles
FHIR-32618 - mustSupport elements aren't complete

@Celine A Lefebvre @Josh Mandel @Cooper Thompson @Lloyd McKenzie
